data.name: Party Words - Music Decks
data.detailed_description:
Purchasing new decks allows you to Host games with that DLC (players do not need to own the DLC to Join).

Music Decks Includes:
2010s Music Deck
2000s Music Deck
90s Music Deck
80s Music Deck
70s Music Deck
60s Music Deck
50s Music Deck
data.about_the_game:
Purchasing new decks allows you to Host games with that DLC (players do not need to own the DLC to Join).

data.short_description: Music Decks for Party Words! Includes: 2010s Music Deck, 2000s Music Deck, 90s Music Deck, 80s Music Deck, 70s Music Deck, 60s Music Deck, & 50s Music Deck

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows Vista or newer (64-bit)
